channel.title: Hosting question
channel.description: I want to host my server. I have made a no-ip and downloaded the no-ip DUC. Im not sure what to do next to run my server for others Please help :(

item.title: Hosting question
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

what kind of internet service do you have?

Most likely if you have internet you have a router.

go to your adress bar and type in your computer ip adress. A box should come up that says username and password.

Default username: admin
Default password: password

if thats wrong then your parents or whoever pays for the internet changed it.

now find port fowars when you get logged on and then go from there

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting question
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Well, First off, make sure you have a Router. If you donâ€™t know what that is, you need to buy a router.
Then when you get your router Brand, (linksys, speedtouch, etc) go to http://portforward.com/ and select your type. Then you can port forward
